alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Northwest Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:40PM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 2 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of a coating to an inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Stafford, Spotsylvania, Eastern Loudoun and Northwest Prince William Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 2 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow and sleet between 7 and 9 AM. Precipitation will change to freezing rain between 9 AM and noon, then rain after 2 PM. Precipitation is expected to end during the early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Loudoun; Northwest Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford
